item.description:
Hi everyone,

Steve and I are planning to meet up on 06/17/2008 at Purgatory Chasm State Reservation at like 5:30ish at the entrance gate where you pay to park and go from there. We are working on our portfolios and are planning on doing modeling shots. If you are interested in doing some modeling/photo taken please come join us. Here is a link to the park.

http://www.mass.gov/d...

Hope you see you there.

Jenn and Steve
item.how_to_find_us: You can meet us at the gates where you pay ($5.00 for parking)
item.name: modeling/photo taking lots of things there
